sense.def:
Here
se nanaša na kraj, kjer smo, ali na kraj, ki je bil omenjen.

seg.quote: She left here at eight o'clock.
You've been here for a number of years.

sense.def:
Here
uporabljamo, kadar govorimo o nekem kraju, osebi ali predmetu, ki je blizu nas.

seg.quote: You have to sign here and acknowledge the receipt.
I have here a very important message that has just arrived.

sense.def:
Here
se lahko nanaša tudi na določen čas, okoliščine ali predmet.

seg.quote: The autumn's really here at last.
I think that what we're talking about here is role-playing.

sense.def:
Here
lahko uporabljamo na začetku stavka, da opozorimo na nekaj ali nekaj napovemo.

‘Here’
lahko rečemo, kadar nekomu nekaj ponudimo.

seg.quote: He pushed a piece of paper across the table. ‘Here you are. My address.’
Here, hold this while I go and get a newspaper.

sense.def:
Zvezo
here's to
uporabljamo v izrazih, kot sta
here's to us
ali
here's to your new job
; izrečemo jo na primer v zdravici, da nekomu zaželimo uspeh ali srečo.

Kadar se nekaj dogaja
here and there
, se dogaja na več različnih krajih ob istem času.

seg.quote: Panic here and there was only to be expected.
